posts.post_content:
I passed one T216 Mino Wags at National, and when I swung back around to the booth a couple hours later, it had been sold.  If you bought it and would like to make a nice return by flipping it, please let me know.

Otherwise, I'm looking for any of the T216 Wagners -- Kotton and Mino.

Thanks,
Steve

Sunday night bump.

Have a good week, all.
Steve

If you're reading this on Sunday night, you should be watching the season premiere of Boardwalk Empire or indulging in Breaking Bad...or watching Manning throw yet another interception...

$100 finder's fee if you provide a lead that results in me buying this Wagner in a private transaction.

Happy Sunday, everyone.
Steve

There is a Kotton Wagner Batting coming up in the October Heritage auction.

[url]http://sports.ha.com/c/item.zx?saleNo=7085&lotIdNo=132001[/url]

And the two Mino Wangers are on ebay currently...

[url]http://www.ebay.com/itm/1911-16-T216-Mino-HONUS-WAGNER-Batting-and-Throwing-SGC-/400237334906?pt=US_Baseball&hash=item5d3001117a[/url]

No need for the finders fee (unless you really want to :D)

Joshua

Hi Joshua,

Thanks for the reply...I appreciate it.

I've seen the Wagners sitting in ebay's BIN museum for some time...at those prices, they aren't going anywhere soon.  :) 

I do check the major auctions, and I already have the Kotton Wagner.

PM me your email address, I'll send you a $20 amazon gift card for taking the time to reply, as I do appreciate it even though I won't be buying those cards.

Best regards,
Steve
